page.title: 15Adult Education
page.content: There are Adult Education Centres in all areas of Sheffield. Most of them are attached to schools. You can get some idea of the things that adults are interested in from the courses that the Centres offer. Some people didn't learn to read and do maths very well at school, and there are special literacy classes for them. It is possible to learn a foreign language - French, Spanish and German are the most common, and English for people from other countries like India and Pakistan whp have come to live here. There are Cookery classes, Sewing and Soft-Furnishing. Keep-Fit is very popular, and Aerobics is the latest craze for women to keep fit and in shape.
